Note that this is a double click to make this occur - not a selection
I use "single click" mode, which explains why I'm getting the errors on select.
The last trace has been logged as Bug 114541

We were not checking the enablement of the open action before running it. Fixed
in build >20051101
Was the NPE in comment #2 part of the same problem?
